subTypes.name: Tropical Rainforest (Af)
subTypes.description: Hot and humid all year with significant rainfall, no dry season.

subTypes.name: Tropical Monsoon (Am)
subTypes.description: Similar to tropical rainforest but with a short dry season.

subTypes.name: Tropical Wet and Dry (Aw/As)
subTypes.description: Distinct wet and dry seasons, hot all year.

subTypes.name: Desert (BWh, BWk)
subTypes.description: Arid climate with very little rainfall, hot (BWh) or cold (BWk).

subTypes.name: Steppe (BSh, BSk)
subTypes.description: Semi-arid climate with more rainfall than deserts, hot (BSh) or cold (BSk).

subTypes.name: Mediterranean (Csa, Csb)
subTypes.description: Warm to hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

subTypes.name: Humid Subtropical (Cfa, Cwa)
subTypes.description: Hot summers, mild winters, precipitation year-round or winter dry.

subTypes.name: Oceanic (Cfb, Cfc)
subTypes.description: Mild temperatures, small temperature ranges, and precipitation year-round.

subTypes.name: Warm Summer Continental (Dfb, Dwb)
subTypes.description: Warm summers, cold winters, year-round precipitation.

subTypes.name: Cool Summer Continental (Dfc, Dwc, Dfd, Dwd)
subTypes.description: Cool summers, very cold winters, precipitation mostly in summer.

subTypes.name: Tundra (ET)
subTypes.description: Cold all year, with brief, cool summers, limited vegetation.

subTypes.name: Ice Cap (EF)
subTypes.description: Extremely cold all year, permanent ice and snow cover.
